channel.title: Trading Places on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Trading Places on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: I Replaced My Mac With an iPad for an Entire Week. It Went as Well as You’d Expect
item.description: The latest iPadOS makes Apple’s tablet behave more like a Mac than ever. Can an iPad now finally replace a Mac for everyone? We find out.
